DOC.brief_summary: Investigate the hypothesis that children with ADHD have difficulty with the allocation of visio-spatial attention related to an inability to control posterior alpha brain oscillations. A paradigm will be used in which the aim is to address covert attention as similar recent studies did in adults with ADHD.
DOC.brief_title: A Study on the Inter-Hemispheric Alpha Ratio in Kids With ADHD (SHARK)
